org.wikipedia
Class Fbot

java.lang.Object
  org.wikipedia.Fbot

public class Fbot
extends java.lang.Object

A Mediawiki bot framework consisting of static methods. Unless otherwise specified, assume that all Wiki objects are logged in. Please report bugs here! Visit our Google Code Project home here! This code and project are licensed under the terms of the GNU GPL v3 license

See Also:
FbotUtil, MBot

Method Detail

loginAndSetPrefs

public static void loginAndSetPrefs(Wiki wiki,
                                    java.lang.String user,
                                    char[] p,
                                    int throttle)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException
Generic login method which turns off maxlag and allows for setting of throttle.

Parameters:
wiki - Wiki object to perform changes on
user - User to login as, without "User:" prefix
p - User's password, in the form of a char array.
throttle - Seconds to wait in between making edits
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If we had a network error
javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException - If we had bad login information

loginAndSetPrefs

public static void loginAndSetPrefs(java.lang.String file,
                                    java.lang.String user,
                                    int throttle,
                                    Wiki wiki)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException
Method reads in user/password combinations from a txt file to log in user. In file, format should be "USERNAME:PASSWORD", separated by colon, one entry per line.

Parameters:
file - File name to use, with ext.
wiki - Wiki object to perform changes on
user - Which account? (no "User:" prefix)
throttle - Number of seconds to wait in between edits
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If we encountered a network error
javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException - If user credentials do not match
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if a non-recognized user is specified.
See Also:
loginAndSetPrefs(org.wikipedia.Wiki, java.lang.String, char[], int)

guiLogin

public static void guiLogin(Wiki wiki)
Login with loginAndSetPrefs(), but using a GUI. Throttle auto-set to 6 edits/min.

Parameters:
wiki - Wiki object to perform changes on
See Also:
loginAndSetPrefs(org.wikipedia.Wiki, java.lang.String, char[], int)

allowBots

public static boolean allowBots(java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String user)
Used to check if {{bots}} or {{robots}}, case-insensitive, is present in a String.

Parameters:
text - The String to check for {{bots}} or {{nobots}}
user - The account to check for, without the "User:" prefix.
Returns:
boolean True if this particular bot should be allowed to edit this page.

namespaceStrip

public static java.lang.String namespaceStrip(java.lang.String title)
Strips the namespace prefix of a page, if applicable. If there is no namespace attached to the passed in string, then the original string is returned.

Parameters:
title - The String to remove a namespace identifier from.
Returns:
The String without a namespace identifier.

getRedirectTarget

public static java.lang.String getRedirectTarget(java.lang.String redirect,
                                                 Wiki wiki)
                                          throws java.lang.Throwable
Gets the target of the redirect page.
PRECONDITION: redirect must be a Redirect.

Parameters:
redirect - The title of the redirect to get the target for.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
String The title of the redirect's target.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - If there was a network issue, non-existent page issue, or if we tried to access a Special: page.
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the page was not a redirect page.

exists

public static boolean exists(java.lang.String page,
                             Wiki wiki)
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
Checks to see if a given page exists on Wiki (i.e. page is not a 'red-link')

Parameters:
page - The page to check for.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
True if the page exists.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

getRedirectsAsRegex

public static java.lang.String getRedirectsAsRegex(java.lang.String template,
                                                   Wiki wiki)
                                            throws java.lang.Throwable
Gets redirects of a template, returns then as a String regex. Ready for replacing instances of templates. Pass in template with "Template:" prefix.

Parameters:
template - The title of the main Template (CANNOT BE REDIRECT), including the "Template:" prefix.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
The regex, in the form (?si)\{\{(Template:)??)(XXXXX|XXXX|XXXX...).*?\}\}, where XXXX is the template and its redirects.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

hasMainspaceFileLink

public static boolean hasMainspaceFileLink(java.lang.String file,
                                           Wiki wiki)
                                    throws java.lang.Throwable
Checks to see if a file has at least one file link to the mainspace.

Parameters:
file - The file to check. Be sure to include "File:" prefix.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
True if the file has at least one mainspace file link.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

categoryNuke

public static java.lang.String[] categoryNuke(java.lang.String cat,
                                              java.lang.String reason,
                                              int namespace,
                                              java.lang.String talkReason,
                                              java.lang.String catReason,
                                              Wiki wiki)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
Deletes all members of a category and then the category itself.

Parameters:
cat - The category to fetch items from, INCLUDING "Category:" prefix.
reason - The reason to use when deleting the category members.
namespace - Restricted to deleting members of a particular namespace.
talkReason - The reason to use when deleting the talk pages of the category members.
catReason - The reason to use when deleting the category.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
An array containing the elements we were unable to delete.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If we had a network error

dbrDump

public static void dbrDump(java.lang.String page,
                           java.lang.String[] list,
                           java.lang.String headerText,
                           java.lang.String footerText,
                           Wiki wiki)
                    throws java.lang.Throwable
Standard Fbot Database dump template. Follows *[[:_TITLE_]]\n.

Parameters:
page - Page to dump report into.
list - The list of pages that need to be dumped
headerText - Leading description text. Specify "" for no lead.
footerText - Ending description text. Specify "" for no end.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

dbrDump

public static void dbrDump(java.lang.String page,
                           java.lang.String[] list,
                           java.lang.String headerText,
                           Wiki wiki)
                    throws java.lang.Throwable
Standard Fbot Database dump template. Follows *[[:_TITLE_]]\n.

Parameters:
page - Page to dump report into.
list - The list of pages that need to be dumped
headerText - Leading description text. Specify "" for no lead.
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

public static void templateReplace(java.lang.String template,
                                   java.lang.String replacementText,
                                   java.lang.String reason,
                                   Wiki wiki)
                            throws java.lang.Throwable
Replaces all transclusions of a template/page with specified text

Parameters:
template - The template (including namespace prefix) to be replaced
replacementText - The text to replace the template with (can include subst:XXXX)
reason - Edit summary to use
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

                                                   int namespace,
                                                   Wiki wiki)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
Returns all the items in an array that are within the specified namespace.

Parameters:
list - The list of items to use
namespace - The namespace of items to return
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
The list of items in the list that were in the specified namespace.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If we had an issue populating namespace cache

                                         java.lang.String[] a2)
Determines if two arrays share at least one element.

Parameters:
a1 - The first array
a2 - The second array
Returns:
True if the arrays share at least one element

                                           java.lang.String reason,
                                           Wiki wiki)

Parameters:
list - The array to use
reason - The reason to use while deleting
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
An array containing the elements we were unable to delete

arrayNuke

public static java.lang.String[] arrayNuke(java.lang.String[] list,
                                           java.lang.String reason,
                                           java.lang.String talkReason,
                                           Wiki wiki)
Deletes all the elements in an array and their associated talk pages

Parameters:
list - The array to use
reason - The reason to use while deleting
talkReason - The reason to use when deleting talk pages of the pages we're deleting
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Returns:
An array containing the elements we were unable to delete.

                               java.lang.String text,
                               java.lang.String summary,
                               Wiki wiki)
Adds specified text to the end of a page

Parameters:
pages - The list of pages to use
text - The text to append
summary - Edit summary to use.
wiki - The wiki object to use.

fileReplace

public static void fileReplace(java.lang.String[] list,
                               java.lang.String file,
                               java.lang.String replacement,
                               java.lang.String summary,
                               Wiki wiki)
Replaces a file with another for a given list of pages.

Parameters:
list - The list of pages to perform replacement on
file - The file to be replaced, without the "File:" prefix
replacement - The file to replace the first file with, without the "File:" prefix
summary - The edit summary to use
wiki - The wiki object to use.

                               java.lang.String reason,
                               java.lang.String tReason,
                               Wiki wiki)
                        throws java.lang.Throwable
Deletes a page and it's talk page (if applicable)

Parameters:
page - The page to delete
reason - The reason to use when deleting this page
tReason - The reason to use when deleting the talk page
wiki - The wiki object to use.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - if we had a problem

getTemplateParam

public static java.lang.String getTemplateParam(java.lang.String template,
                                                int number)
Attempts to parse out a template parameter.

Parameters:
template - The template to work on. Must be entered in format {{NAME|PARM1|PARAM2|...}}
number - The parameter to retrieve: {{NAME|1|2|3|4...}}
Returns:
The param we parsed out or null if we didn't find a param matching the specified criteria

getTemplateParam

public static java.lang.String getTemplateParam(java.lang.String template,
                                                java.lang.String param)
Attempts to parse out a template parameter based on specification

Parameters:
template - The template to work on. Must be entered in format {{NAME|PARM1|PARAM2|...}}
param - The parameter to retrieve, without "=".
Returns:
The param we parsed out or null if we didn't find a param matching the specified criteria

templateParamStrip

public static java.lang.String templateParamStrip(java.lang.String p)
Returns the param of a template. e.g. If we get "|foo = baz", we return baz.

Parameters:
p - Must be a param in the form "|foo = baz" or "foo = baz"
Returns:
The param we parsed out

parseTemplateFromPage

public static java.lang.String parseTemplateFromPage(java.lang.String text,
                                                     java.lang.String template,
                                                     boolean redirects,
                                                     Wiki wiki)
                                              throws java.lang.Throwable
Parses out the first instance of a template from a body of text, based on specified template.

Parameters:
text - Text to search
template - The Template (in template namespace) to look for. DO NOT add namespace prefix.
redirects - Whether to incorporate redirects to this template or not.
wiki - The wiki object to use
Returns:
The template we parsed out, in the form {{TEMPLATE|ARG1|ARG2|...}} or null, if we didn't find the specified template.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - if Big boom

parseFromPageRegex

public static java.lang.String parseFromPageRegex(java.lang.String text,
                                                  java.lang.String regex)
Parses out the first group of matching text, based on specified regex. Useful for parsing out templates.

Parameters:
text - Text to search
regex - The regex to use
Returns:
The text we parsed out, or null if we didn't find anything.

offsetTime

public static java.util.GregorianCalendar offsetTime(int days)
Returns a Gregorian Calendar offset by a given number of days from the current system clock. Use positive int to offset by future days and negative numbers to offset to days before. Automatically set to UTC.

Parameters:
days - The number of days to offset by -/+
Returns:
The newly modified calendar.

fetchDateUTC

public static java.lang.String fetchDateUTC(java.lang.String format,
                                            int offset)
Outputs the date/time in UTC. Based on the format and offset in days.

Parameters:
format - Must be specified in accordance with java.text.DateFormat.
offset - The offset from the current time, in days. Accepts both positive (for future) and negative values (for past)
Returns:
The formatted date string.

                           java.lang.String user)
                    throws java.lang.Throwable
Logs in using a user-defined file named "px".

Parameters:
wiki - The wiki object to use
user - The user to be logged in
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable
